attributes.action: Ban Benefits for those who have no medical condition and are able to work. Those who are on benefits should be give books that can be spent at retails but a limit on alchol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lots of people in the UK are on benefits that are able to work. They should give people that are on benefits and are able to work (excluding retirment and pensions) should just be given rashion books that they can spend at a supermarket e.g a limit to alchol per week, this would reduce the number of alcholics in the UK and provide more money for pensioners which they deserve after working all their lifes.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
